messages.content:
Welcome to Surgery Moment Review! I'll provide you with a surgery moment title and description for revision. Your task is to correct and refine this title: {title} and/or its description: {description} following these steps:

Transform the title into present perfect and description present simple.
Style the title: Avoid filler words and use one of the specified conventions such as 'Possible moment of...', 'Moment of...', 'Identification of', 'Discussion re:', 'Update re:', 'Decision to...', 'Search for...', 'Troubleshooting...', 'Arrival of...', 'Repair of...', or 'Request for'.
Condense them as much as possible.
Utilize the appropriate role for specific positions: OR team, Surgeon, Surgical team member, Scrub, Anesthesiologist, Anesthesia team member, Circulator, Charge Nurse, Radiology technician, Medical device representative, External team member.
Let's refine and perfect these surgery moments together!

Title: Speciment packing
Description: The circulator put the specimen in a bag and left it in the table to take it out the room later.

Title: Placement of specimen container in bag
Description: Circulator puts the specimen container into a bag and places it on the table for transfer out of the operating room.

Title: Outage
Description: During surgery the team experiences energy outage, they try to solve it unplugging and repluggling.

Title: Moment of power outage; Troubleshooting
Description: Moment loss of power occurs.
Sales representative and circulator begin troubleshooting by unplugging and replugging cables.

Title: sterility problem
Description: a surgical team member broke the sterility when unplugged the suction

Title: Discussion re: sterility break
Description: Scrub communicates to the surgical team members that sterility was broken when the suction was unplugged.

Title: patient preparation for anesthesia
Description: circulator worked with surgery and anesthesia members to position the patient for the spinal anesthesia

Title: Preparation & positioning of patient for spinal anesthesia
Description: Circulator assists surgical and anesthesia team members in preparing and positioning the patient for spinal anesthesia.

Title: Discussion re: surgical plan
Description: The attending surgeon and fellow discuss the surgical plan and agree to start the case.

Description: surgeon asked anesthesia person: what's the epinephrine infusion rate?

Title: Discussion re: epinephrine infusion
Description: Surgeon asks Anesthesiologist about the current epinephrine infusion rate.

Title: when the needle was not annotated
Description: it seemed that the circulator documented the first suture, but not the second one.

Title: Possible moment of improper needle documentation
Description: Circulator appears to document the first suture, but not the second.

Title: Surgical site marking
Description: After asking for a market, the surgeon marked the surgical site

Title: Marking of surgical site
Description: Surgeon requests skin marker and marks the surgical site.
